page.title: 13The Families in our school(1
page.content: We surveged the children in the school and asked them what their parents jobs were.{Jobs.}As we are in the country there are more farming families than anything else. There are 15 farming families in fact. All the other jobs in our school are done by one or two families only. People travel to jobs in other squares like teaching and the Water board, Insureance people and a lorry driver.One lorry driver does work in our squares. Two people mend machines. Only one person does construction work. Although there are quite a lot of pubs in our area only one pub person's child comes to our school.They do catering too.Only one person owns a shop in our area.
